list.title: Professional Profile Photo
list.description: Use a professional headshot for your profile to maximize your conversion rates.

list.title: Biography
list.description: Your biography should highlight any skills or experiences that set you apart from others.

list.title: Professional Experience
list.description: Lawyers with more experience, particularly relevant work experience, tend to instill greater confidence and trust.

list.title: Justia Lawyer Rating
list.description: Consumers are more likely to contact and retain a lawyer with a high Justia rating. Ask other lawyers familiar with your work to write a review.
